mapper.select: SELECT MODULE_ID ,MODULE_NM ,MODULE_DESC ,0 AS GUN_CNT ,0 AS EXPLOSIVES_CNT ,0 AS LIVE_AMMUNITION_CNT ,0 AS SWORD_CNT ,0 AS WEAPON_CNT ,0 AS CAMOUFLAGE_WEAPON_CNT ,0 AS TOOL_LIFE_CNT ,0 AS FLAMMABILITY_CNT ,0 AS DANGER_MATERIALS_CNT ,0 AS LIQUID_GEL_CNT ,0 AS PASS_CNT ,STUDY_LVL ,SLIDE_SPEED ,MODULE_TYPE ,USE_YN ,QUESTION_CNT ,GUN_SCORE ,EXPLOSIVES_SCORE ,LIVE_AMMUNITION_SCORE ,SWORD_SCORE ,WEAPON_SCORE ,CAMOUFLAGE_WEAPON_SCORE ,TOOL_LIFE_SCORE ,FLAMMABILITY_SCORE ,DANGER_MATERIALS_SCORE ,LIQUID_GEL_SCORE ,PASS_SCORE ,TOTAL_SCORE ,INSERT_ID ,INSERT_DATE ,UPDATE_ID ,UPDATE_DATE FROM XBT_MODULE_INFO_MASTER WHERE MODULE_ID = #{moduleId}
SELECT MODULE_DETAIL_ID , MODULE_ID , STUDY_LVL , BAG_SCAN_ID , UNIT_ID , UNIT_GROUP_CD , INSERT_ID , INSERT_DATE FROM XBT_MODULE_INFO_DETAIL WHERE MODULE_ID = #{moduleId}
SELECT POINTS_STD_ID /* 배점기준ID */ ,POINTS_STD_NM /* 배점기준명칭 */ ,POINTS_STD_DC /* 배점기준설명 */ ,USE_YN /* 사용여부 */ FROM xbt_POINTS_STD_INFO /* XBT배점기준정보 Table */ ORDER BY POINTS_STD_ID /* 배점기준ID */

SELECT POINTS_STD_ID /* 배점기준ID */ ,ACTION_DIV AS ACTION_DIV /* ACTION구분 */ ,FN_GET_COMCODE_NAME('0002', ACTION_DIV ,'kor') AS ACTION_NM /* ACTION구분명 */ ,NVL(BAN_UNIT_SCORE,0) AS BAN_UNIT_SCORE /* 금지물품점수 */ ,NVL(LIMIT_UNIT_SCORE,0) AS LIMIT_UNIT_SCORE /* 제한물품점수 */ ,NVL(QUESTION_UNIT_SCORE,0) AS QUESTION_UNIT_SCORE /* 의심물품점수 */ ,NVL(PASS_UNIT_SCORE,0) AS PASS_UNIT_SCORE /* 통과물품점수 */ FROM xbt_POINTS_STD_DC t1

SELECT A.EDU_TYPE_ID /* 교육타입ID */ ,A.EDU_TYPE_NM /* 교육타입명칭 */ ,A.EDU_TYPE_DC /* 교육타입설명 */ ,A.USE_YN /* 사용여부 */ ,A.POINTS_STD_ID /* 배점기준ID */ ,B.POINTS_STD_NM /* 배점기준명칭 */ ,A.INSERT_ID /* 등록자ID */ ,A.INSERT_DATE /* 등록일 */ ,A.UPDATE_ID /* 수정자ID */ ,A.UPDATE_DATE /* 수정일 */ FROM xbt_EDU_TYPE_INFO A /* XTS교육타입상세 TABLE */ LEFT JOIN xbt_POINTS_STD_INFO B ON A.POINTS_STD_ID = B.POINTS_STD_ID
